subject: Congratulations, You're Lucky!
body: He straightened up and his legs cursed him roundly.  basepoint     aerosol  "He didn't reply.He had collected four of her bobby-pins as assiduously as a squirrel collects nuts for the winter, and had secreted them under his mattress along with the pills.
